name: Scramble
0:
”Alexa, open Scramble Quiz.”
”Alexa ask Scramble Quiz for help.”
”Alexa, play Scramble Quiz.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scramble quiz
des:
Spelling can be challenging. But back spelling is another kind of fun. This game is a back spelling quiz with 2 possible levels: beginner and expert. Feel free to grab a piece of paper and a pen. 

Each round has 7 questions. In beginner level, on every question, you'll be given a word spelt backwards and you will have to guess it from a list of 4 items.
In the expert level, on every question, you'll be given a word and you must guess the correct way of spelling it backwards from a list of 4 items.

If at any point you get confused, you can ask Alexa to repeat the question. 
At the end of each round, you can change your game level or play another round at the same difficulty.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
